comment.author: 9574314@N07
comment._content: I think the area is Central,  the upper photo from the right is Bonham Strand East, Jervois Street, Queen's Road Central.

comment.author: 61013804@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/western_linkage] I agree about the streets. The decoration over Bonham Strand East very much resembled that seen for the royal visit of Prince Arthur, Duke of Connaught, in 1890. Ref The Hong Kong Album 香港歷史圖片 3rd ed 1986 p.57
